LanguageData.CommandAutoRearmDesc: If this is on, this trap will automatically be designated for rearming when it springs.
LanguageData.LetterFriendlyTrapSprung: {1_labelShort} has accidentally sprung a trap and taken damage from it.
LanguageData.DesignatorRearmTrapDesc: Rearm a sprung trap so it can be triggered again.
LanguageData.CommandRearmDesc: Rearm a sprung trap so it can be triggered again.
LanguageData.CommandAutoRearmDesc: Toggle a trap to auto designate itself for rearming.
LanguageData.FriendlyFireDesc: If traps should be able to hit friendly pawns
LanguageData.TreatAnimalsDifferentDesc: If animal spring chance should be calculated differently than for pawns
LanguageData.UseBodySizeDesc: Use body size in calculation or not
LanguageData.WildAnimalsCanTripDesc: Let non hostile wild animals be unaware of traps
LanguageData.SuperSlowTrapsDesc: Increase the speed reduction effect by 10x
LanguageData.TrapsDontSlowDesc: Removes the speed reduction caused by active traps
LanguageData.RearmTicksDesc: Amount of ticks taken to rearm a trap
